about_the_game:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Injuries Cases #1 scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Injuries Package #1:

  • 36yo male s/p GSW to the abdomen
  • 12yo M with Ankle Injury
  • 8yo M with Arm Pain
  • 15yo F altered mental status
  • 32yo male s/p MCC. Helmeted. + LOC. Complaining of R neck pain and headache
  • 15yo F with Nausea/Vomiting, possible ingestion
  • 17yo F with Ankle Injury
  • 56yo male hit during football practice
  • 7yo M with Arm Pain
detailed_description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Injuries Cases #1 scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Injuries Package #1:

  • 36yo male s/p GSW to the abdomen
  • 12yo M with Ankle Injury

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320 M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
